title: Deployment - New Wi-Fi Installation
description: A project requires the installation of a new Wi-Fi system across a client's office.

tasks.description: Perform a wireless site survey to determine the optimal placement for new Wi-Fi access points (APs).
tasks.expected_outcome: A site survey map is created, showing ideal AP locations.

tasks.description: Install the new APs and connect them to the network switches.
Configure the wireless controller with the appropriate SSIDs, VLANs, and security settings.
tasks.expected_outcome: The new Wi-Fi network is configured and broadcasting.

tasks.description: Test the coverage and performance of the new Wi-Fi network to ensure it meets requirements.
tasks.expected_outcome: The new network is confirmed to be providing strong and fast coverage throughout the office.
